law.catch_line: A candidate for public office of a political party shall be nominated in accordance with the require...
law.text:
A candidate for public office of a political party shall be nominated in accordance with the requirements of Subtitles 2 through 4 of this title unless the candidate is:
nominated by:
petition under § 5-703 of this subtitle; or
political party under § 5-703.1 of this subtitle; or
a write-in candidate under § 5-704 of this subtitle.
